transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as short,
		Column_3 as short,
		Column_4 as short,
		Column_5 as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> singleSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'myfilename',
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/USQL/Postcode_Estimates_2*.csv']) ~> multipleSource
singleSource select(mapColumn(
		postcode = Column_1,
		total = Column_2,
		males = Column_3,
		females = Column_4,
		numberofhouseholds = Column_5
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProjection
Casting filter(substring(lower(postcode),1,3) == 'm12') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(desc(total, true)) ~> Sort1
SelectProjection derive(total = toInteger(total)) ~> Casting
multipleSource derive(Postcode = toString(byName('Postcode')),
		OA_Code = toString(byName('OA_Code')),
		Total = toShort(byName('Total')),
		Percentage = toShort(byName('Percentage'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 aggregate(groupBy(OA_Code),
	total = count(1),
		myfilename = first(myfilename)) ~> SelectCountByOACode
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['M12Postcodes.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
SelectCountByOACode sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['oacode_totals.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
